name: ode to friendship
description:
A touching serenade to the little things that add up to the bigness of a true platonic love.

Whosoever… is overrun with solitariness, or carried away with pleasing melancholy and vain conceits… or crucified with worldly care, I can prescribe 'em no better remedy than… to compose themselves to the learning of some art.

and yes, we can count on so few people to go that hard way with us. :)

Ode to Friendship
2100x2300 | 300dpi
Hand-drawn digitally on procreate
Artwork of 2022 by Opuscula
